headline: Former Grocery Outlet and Consumer Goods Executive Tim Scott Joins FourKites' Strategic Advisory Council
summary: CHICAGO, June 26, 2025--Former Grocery Outlet and consumer goods executive Tim Scott brings decades of supply chain transformation experience to FourKites' advisory council.

headline: South Africa Breakfast Cereals Manufacturing Market Report 2025 | Food Inflation Pressures, New Products, Regulation, and Consumption Patterns
summary: The South African breakfast cereal market is evolving amid food inflation, regulation changes, and growing health consciousness. The industry's growth is fueled by demand for healthier, organic, and gluten-free options, driving major brands like Kellogg’s, Mondelez, and Nestlé to innovate with reduced sugar content and sustainable practices. Emerging trends include cereals as snacks and the rise of grab-and-go bars. Challenges include climate impacts and rising costs, while opportunities lie in

headline: Mondelez Strengthens Dividend Appeal with Buy Ratings
summary: Mondelez International, Inc. (NASDAQ:MDLZ) is one of the 10 low risk dividend paying stocks for June 2025. Morgan Stanley maintains a Buy rating on the stock, with a price target of $72.
